title: mUSD Treasury Diversification - Amount
body:
It is proposed to diversify the mStableDAO's USD treasury from being 100% in mUSD, into some amount of another stablecoin alongside mUSD. This is being done to manage risk ahead of the mUSD contract upgrade, which will see the deployment of a new AMM and bAsset selection.

Whilst we have the utmost confidence in the integrity of mStable's code and the risk protections built into the protocol, smart contract upgrades represent a potential opportunity for "black swan" events. Thus we believe this diversification to be responsible management of the mStableDAO's USD treasury given the circumstances.

**If you are for the diversification of the mStableDAO's USD treasury, what percentage of the total USD balance should be held in another USD stablecoin?**
author: 0x4B37BbC8CAb32aade27Ce8b1bb2A9E614de81E03
